channel.title: How do i make an emote admins only?
channel.description: In pimpscape i wanna make my admin island an emote.. i got it so i tele there with the emote but how do i make it admins only?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2007, 08:40:15 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: How do i make an emote admins only?
item.dc:creator: @hinat hinat
item.description:
@hinat wrote:

mine looks like this:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”) && playerRights >= 1){
sendMessage(“staffzone w00t, added by hinata”);
showInterface(1908);
teleportToX = 2612;
teleportToY = 3479;
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”) && playerRights >= 0){
if(playerRights <= 0)
sendMessage(“mod+ to use”);
}

then to make it a emote, ull have to search for the case it is, with me its 168 and looks like this:

}
break;
case 168:
if(teleblock == true){ //Made by musicmad441
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}

between the other cases
thats how i did it hope it helps =)
also, all this is modifyed in client
